name: Dean Blunt
description: '''Roy Chukwuemeka Nnawuchi''' (born 8 February 1984), better known by his pseudonym '''Dean Blunt''', is an English singer-songwriter, musician, producer and [[contemporary art]]ist. He is best known for his current solo work as well as his previous work as part of [[avant-garde]] duo [[Hype Williams (band)|Hype Williams]] (with [[Inga Copeland]]) and the hip hop project Babyfather. Blunt was also the founder of London rock band Graffiti Island. He has been described as "a prolific, category-rejecting artist" and "an [[art-pop]] provocateur."
